item.title: Stocks that outperform and underperform following a 15% oil spike, according to history
item.description: If history is any guide, the recent spike in oil should leave investors wanting to dump or short shares of automakers and buy some tech stocks.

item.title: JPMorgan likes these 3 digital banking pure plays, predicting one will rally nearly 50%
item.description: The bank laid out these stocks as tied to the digital banking space.

item.title: RBC Capital Markets downgrades this solar stock following sell-off
item.description: The firm downgraded the solar stock to sector perform.

item.title: Guggenheim lifts Oracle price target to highest on the Street
item.description: Guggenheim sees more room for Oracle to run.

item.title: A bearish options trade on Apple as the tech giant struggles
item.description: Apple is showing signs of vulnerability, says options trader Tony Zhang.
